```{python, Dot3-ts, Dot_open = F, Dot_close = T}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
t = 1 + np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
s = 1 + np.sin(2*np.pi*t)
plt.plot(t,s)
plt.show()
```
